# ezextras

Utility functions to make coding and analysis even faster

## Installation

You can install the development version of ezextras from [GitHub](https://github.com/EricLamphere/ezextras.git) with:

``` r
remotes::install_github("https://github.com/EricLamphere/ezextras.git")
```
